alert.note: Alert for Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:54PM EDT until July 15 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT/645 PM CDT/ FOR EAST CENTRAL JACKSON...NORTHWESTERN DECATUR... MILLER...SOUTHWESTERN BAKER...CENTRAL EARLY AND SEMINOLE COUNTIES... At 654 PM EDT/554 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Colquitt to 13 miles northwest of Chattahoochee, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Newton, Donalsonville, Bainbridge, Centerville, Iron City, Damascus, Brinson, Hanover, Ausmac, Babcock, Reynoldsville, Little Hope, Mayhaw, Decatur Co A/P, Boykin, Riverturn, Mimsville, Sharphagen and Donaldsonville A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
